about.description: Hello, I'm Robson, a Web Developer from Jundiaí - SP, Brazil. With experience in web and mobile development, focusing on scalable and optimized applications. Knowledge in

features.title: Web and Mobile Development
features.description: Creation of responsive and scalable web and mobile applications, using modern technologies to ensure high performance, security, and an excellent user experience.

features.title: API and Database
features.description: Development of efficient and well-structured APIs, ensuring seamless integration between systems. Work with relational and non-relational databases, focusing on optimization and scalability.

features.title: Best Practices and Performance
features.description: Application of principles like SOLID, TDD, and DDD to ensure clean and sustainable code. Implementation of strategies to optimize application performance, following industry best practices.
